name: Tetris Clone (RedBack Prod)
description:
This is a Tetris Clone inspired from the original Tetris by Alexey Payitnov.

Speed and Levels match the original Game. Try and get a high score and post in the comment section below :) 

Controls are very easy. Start the game and use the arrow keys to control the tetrominoes.

Donate if you want to support Indies :) Enjoy.
